title: Help me get in contact with the creative department at Riot

embed.description: Enrol for a career in Music, Entertainment Business, Audio Engineering, Digital Design, Animation, Game Development, Film and Television, and Songwriting.

body:
Good afternoon everybody! I am a Game Design student at JMC Academy in Melbourne Victoria.
We have an upcoming assessment that requires we interview some people who work with creative processes.
I was wondering if any of you could help to put me in touch with someone who is apart of the concept/character designs of League of Legends for some questions via email or phone call.
Thank you so much for taking the time to read my post! 
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
